titleStmt.title: A true and ample relation of all such occurrences as have happened in the Palatinate since the first of Iune. 1622 Stilo antiquo. Truely related in a letter, received from Doctor VVelles the tenth of Iune. 1622. And now printed the 14 of Iune. 1622.
titleStmt.author: Welles, Doctor.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. D[awson] for Iohn Bartlet, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Gilt Cup in Cheap-side, in the Gold-smiths Row,

notesStmt.note: "This belongs in the Newsbooks section following 51A."-- STC.
British Library copy reads "14 of iune" on title page, line 12.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the Gilt Cup in Cheap-side, in the Gold-smiths Row
